description.en: SafePe's LOOX coin is an innovative payment network and a new kind of money. SafePe provides Secured cryptocurrency exchange which offers Peer to Peer & Hybrid solutions to the community within the network and exchanging the various utility services for the community such as Travel, e-commerce, Agriculture, etc. LOOX Coin is a decentralized, traceable form of the most pragmatic payment method in which everyone can contribute. LOOX Coin powers SafePe Ecosystem to be used within multiple Middlemen free Utility DApps for Peer-to-Peer Exchange via single Sign-On Application through web and mobile application It is fast and safe, striving to be a ‘concept’ that everyone uses like the email. Most secure 5 layers security and very easy to use the mobile application which will make you happy with every transaction.
